Name: Wings of Messenger Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1
Travel with the Wings of Messenger, which enables High Altitude Flight, to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Travel with the Wings of Messenger, which enables High Altitude Flight, to travel very fast. Double-click a location on the World Map, and you will automatically fly to the destination, following the navigation line. (Auto-pilot is only available in certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Riding Authorization Continents by purchasing Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1
Travel with the Wings of Messenger, which enables High Altitude Flight, to travel very fast.
